title: Dungeons and Dragons: So You Want to Play A Villain! (How not to be Chaotic Stupid)
description:
I've recently taken the dive into Dungeons and Dragons. But not just any game. Our setting was Strixhaven. However, while playing in a setting so deliberately made to mirror modern college campuses, one old D&D topic, of course, came to mind. How to play an evil character without venturing into Chaotic Stupid.
